quran_verse: Allah Almighty said: "And fulfill the covenant of Allah when you have taken it, and do not break oaths after their confirmation while you have made Allah, over you, a witness." (Surah An-Nahl, 16:91)

commitment_text_1: I pledge and swear by Allah, as the advertiser, to pay the application fee which is 1% of the sale value, whether the sale is through the application or because of it.
commitment_text_2: I also pledge to pay the fees within a period not exceeding from the date of receiving the full inspection amount.
note: Note: The application fees are the responsibility of the advertiser, and the advertiser is not absolved of the fees unless they are paid.
